personalizedNewsDesc: AI-curated news based on your selected keywords.
noNewsDesc: No news matches your selected keywords. Try different keywords or check back later.

errors.networkError: Please check your internet connection. Unable to connect to server.

errors.notFound: The requested information could not be found.
